column1: Upon  considering  the  submissions  of  both  parties,  we  are  of  the  opinion  that  the
sentence of rigorous imprisonment of ten years to be reduced to seven years rigorous
imprisonment  and  the  sentence  for  1st    charge  to  remain  the  same  and  both  to  run
concurrently from the date of sentencing which is 06.08.2021.
The  rest  of  the  sentences  to  remain  the  same  with  regard  to  the  1st  and  the  2nd
charges.   Subject to the above the instant application is dismissed.
